channel.description: The game works fine when I'm playing it but when I quit the proper way the screen goes blank and never returns me to my desktop or steam.

item.title: Blank screen after quiting
item.dc:creator: LordDz
item.description:
ecks06:

I’m sorry. I’m running Windows 10 64-bit. I’m not exactly sure which launch options you are referring to.

Right click the game in your steam games list.
Click properties.
Under the general tab, click “Set Launch options”
Copy paste this:
-windowed -noborder -console

item.title: Blank screen after quiting
item.dc:creator: Johnwalter
item.description:
@RedEye meant that you post the hardware specifications of your PC system:

For example here are my specs:
Motherboard: Asus P8Z77-V Pro
CPU: Intel i7 3770
GPU: Asus GTX1070
RAM: 16GB
HDD: WD Black Caviar 2TB
SSD: Samsung 840 Pro (Windows installed here)
PSU: be quiet! 80+ Gold ATX 580W
OS: Windows 10 64-bit

As for the launch options:

  1. Open “Steam”
  2. Go to “Library”
  3. Right click on “Black Mesa”
  4. Click “Properties”
  5. In the “General” tab, click on “Set Launch Options…”
  6. Then copy&paste this: “-windowed -noborder” in it
  7. Click “OK”, start the game and close it to see if it worked.
